question:
Read the paragraph below.    Rudi and his classmates played basketball earlier in the morning at school. Many students watched them. The game was exciting before an accident happened. Unfortunately, Rudi injured his ankle. He fell on the court. His friends took him to the school clinic. Later in the night, he can barely sleep. ....

The best sentence to complete the paragraph is ....

a. he is hurtful enough to sleep
b. it's too painful for him too 
sleep
c. it's enough hurtful for him too sleep
d. the paint is painful too to sleep
e. he ankle is enough hurt too sleep​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Read the paragraph below.

Rudi and his classmates played basketball earlier in the morning at school. Many students watched them. The game was exciting before an accident happened. Unfortunately, Rudi injured his ankle. He fell on the court. His friends took him to the school clinic. Later in the night, he can barely sleep. ....

The best sentence to complete the paragraph is ....

a. he is hurtful enough to sleep

b. it's too painful for him too

sleep

c. it's enough hurtful for him too sleep

d. the paint is painful too to sleep

e. he ankle is enough hurt too sleep

Penjelasan:

di atas jawapin ya

Baca paragraf di bawah ini.

Rudi dan teman-teman sekelasnya bermain basket pagi-pagi sekali di sekolah. Banyak siswa yang memperhatikan mereka. Pertandingan berlangsung seru sebelum kecelakaan terjadi. Sayangnya, Rudi

related_questions.question:
My House    I am Nisa. I live in Patokbeusi. My house is at no. 40 Jl. Raya Patokbeust. It's not big house
It's medium. It's painted grey. It has two floors. I like it anyway. It has a small garden and palm
and mango tree in front of the house. It has looks green and nice
My house has four bedrooms, two living rooms, a dining room, a kitchen and two
bathrooms. My bedroom is in the front part of the house, next to the living room. My parents' room
is in the middle part of the house next to the dining room. The kitchen and the bathroom are at the
back part of the house. I love house
very
much​

Write down the generic structure of the text about!

bantuin woi​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Generic Structure of Descriptive Text : Identification, Description

Penjelasan:

# Identification: (contains about the introduction of a person, place, animal or object will be described.)

# Description: contains a description of something such as animal, things, place or person by describing its features, forms, colors, or anything related to what the writer describe.

Jawaban:

Orientation

A mobile phone - portable radio telephone

Event

The first mobile phone - in japan

General classification

A cell phone combines - wireless communication

Description

Paragraph 2-3 is a descriptiom about phone

Jawaban:

You....... an old table​

You have an old table.

Penjelasan:

Jawaban pada kalimat di atas dicetak tebal dan merupakan bentuk Simple Present Tense karena menjelaskan fakta. Jika subjek nya adalah kata You, maka harus memakai kata kerja Have yang artinya memiliki.

Semoga membantu ya.

Jawaban:

I can't answer me because I can't speak English

related_questions.question:
I'm sorry but I won't be able meet you and bertha for lunch on friday.    what is the writer's reason canceled luch ?
artinya​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Saya minta maaf, karena saya tidak bisa datang untuk bertemu denganmu dan bertha untuk makan siang di hari jumat.

Apa alasan penulis membatalkan janjian makan siang?

Jawaban:

Maaf tapi saya tidak bisa bertemu denganmu dan Bertha untuk makan siang di hari Jumat

Apa alasan si penulis membatalkan makan siangnya?

related_questions.question:
Change these Reported Speech into Direct Speech    1. She said she had never seen a comet.

 2. They said it had been a wonderful time.

 3. My father asked me who I played with.

 4. He told us he was going to do judo

 5. He told me he had to help his father.

 Change the Direct Speech into Reported Speech

 1. Mum asked : "Have you got the keys?"

 2. He said ; "You should listen to the teacher."

 3. The police : "Don't park here!"

 4. Susan : "Who has drunk the water?"

 5. They asked : "Why didn't you play with us?"

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Reported to Direct:

1. "I had never seen a comet," she said.

2. "It has been a wonderful time," they said.

3. My father asked me, "Who did you play with?"

4. "I'm going to do judo," he told us.

5. He said, "I have to help my father"

Direct to Reported:

1. My mum asked me if I got the keys.

2. He told me that I should listen to the teacher.

3. The police said to not park here.

4. Susan asked who had drunk the water.

5. They asked me why I didn't play with them.
